data.title: Fix license in package.xml for SPDX conformance
refactor: reduce QuickDecode memory usage by 31.5%
Added notes about installing packages from the distro
Use local variables for line fit stats accumulation
Use path halving in unionfind to improve performance
Avoid malloc overhead for small arrays in ptsort
fix: windows crosscompilation and added a workflow to test it by crosscompiling on ubuntu and running tests on windows
Permit to specify the Python install location as CMake command line option
When using CMake >= 3.24 use CMAKE_COMPILE_WARNING_AS_ERROR variable instead of setting `-Werror` directly
add MXE cross-compilation support with pthread and gettimeofda…
Update README.md with OpenHarmony build project
Acquire Lock Before Releasing Python GIL
Release Python Global Interpreter Lock During Detection
fix segmentation fault in conda env #352
Add clarity to tag coordinate system reference frame in README
Install CMake config to architecture-specific location
Modify the memory allocation method of `matd_t` to comply with ISO standards
Dissable threads at compile time with NOTHREADS option
fix the tag ID comparison and let it return the tag difference
fix refine_edges() and the coordinates recovery when quad_decimate > …
Add missing copyright header in tag36h10.c file
Fix spurious wake-ups and worker threads initialization in workerpool
apriltag_quad_thresh: Prevent conversion from NaN to int
Changed Nthreads to threads in apriltag_py_type.docstring
test Ubuntu 24.04 in the CI and make tests more robust
reset errno at the beginning of Python function that check it in the end
Improve CMakeLists config path by using CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR
bump minor version to prepare release
enable Python bindings for Windows and macOS
Stop adding duplicate points to the clusters.
Speed up quad_segment_maxima by skipping unneeded lineparam calculation.
CMake install: Set .dll location to bin folder
Changed type to size_t for consistent type comparison
change default decimation parameter for python wrapper
Speed up cluster merge by batch copying arrays
Document the meaning of apriltag_pose_t struct
Remove the duplicate assignment of zh->nentries
[Format] Modify the indentation of function declarations
Change rpath of the cython file
Split work up in gradient_clusters more finely
Added a cmake option for building example executables
add 3x3 rotation matrix to quaternion function
Build as sub components with defined exports
Change WARNING to STATUS for building demo when OpenCV is not found
version the pkg-config file and use standard CMake for formatting
Fixed refine_edges keyword to allow it to be referenced in Python
Issue #239: Fixed cross compiling for windows library
Use official ros-tooling actions for CI
add documentation on how to enable and use the AddressSanitizer
[cmake] sanitazier flags in C_FLAGS instead of CXX
Safely fail homography building when failing row swap
Adding check for length 0 in fit_line to avoid NaN
Support for disabling asserts at compile time
Removing string copy from timeprofile calls
Fixing compiler warning in unionfind.h for maxint
Updating apriltag demo with image statistics (path and size)
Updating the OpenCV demo with some statistics (FPS/capture info)
Reuse p and R memory from params in apriltag_pose
build with AddressSanitizer to find memory issues
Fixed a memory leak in matd_svd_tall
Remove exit from quick decode init
Hotfix for #178: Adds missing OpenCV components
Python wrapper change so that a new tag family can be used in Python
New CI based on GitHub Actions
Add ALIAS target "apriltag" for "apriltag::apriltag" to achieve backwards compatibility
[cmake] fix include path so that we can include <apriltag/apriltag.h>
Revert change that removed an iteration limit in matd_svd_tall.
Improves build system for edge cases.
Fix assumption that CMAKE_INSTALL_*DIR paths are relative
Fix memory corruption on mem_pools in do_gradient_clusters()
Apriltag library build in Windows without pthreads or winmm (option to remove OpenCV and Python added in CMake)
Allow for compilation on Windows without any dependencies
Adding a static version of the AprilTag library
use FILES rules to install python wrapper
propose another method for estimating tag position.
Please have a look at the AprilTags.jl library
Add Python3 wrapper thanks to Dima Kogan
Set version to 3.1 and add myself as maintainer for bloom release
Added a cast from int to unsigned int in common/matd.h
Add Travis CI using ROS-Industrial CI
Correctly deallocate detections in opencv demo
Add a license file as per guidelines
Check for NULL before calling matd_destroy
Tiny memory leak in tag families implementation
